net.objectzoo.delegates.impl

Class AsyncFutureTask<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<R>
      • net.objectzoo.delegates.impl.AsyncFutureTask<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the type of the return value of the invocation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<R>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<R>, ActionAsyncResult, FunctionAsyncResult<R>

    public class AsyncFutureTask<R>
extends java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<R>
implements FunctionAsyncResult<R>, ActionAsyncResult
    This FutureTask subclass is used internally for the asynchronous invocation of actions and funcions and implements the interfaces FunctionAsyncResult and ActionAsyncResult so that it directly serves as return value for the asynchronous invocations and as parameter given to the callback methods.
    Author:
    tilmann

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AsyncFutureTask(java.util.concurrent.Callable<R> callable, java.util.function.Consumer<? super FunctionAsyncResult<R>> callback, java.lang.Object asyncState)
      Creates a new AsyncFutureTask that invokes the given callable and holds the given asyncState and callback.

      Waits if necessary for the FunctionAsync to complete, and then retrieves its return value.
      R endReturn(long timeout, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Waits if necessary for at most the given time for the FunctionAsync to complete, and then retrieves its return value, if available.
      java.lang.Object getAsyncState()
      Retrieves the async state object associated with the FunctionAsync invocation.

        Creates a new AsyncFutureTask that invokes the given callable and holds the given asyncState and callback.
        Parameters:
        callable - the callable to be invoked asynchronously
        callback - the callback to be called when the invocation has finished
        asyncState - the asynchronous state object to be returned by this asynchronous result
